Unusual outbound network connections to.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log for outbound connections on port 43. Monitor Zeek dns.log for queries to known WHOIS servers or domain lookup services. Identify destination IPs/domains and query patterns. Use frequency analysis to spot unusual surges in WHOIS queries.

Logs showing queries for sensitive organ.Action: Analyze Zeek http.log for search terms submitted to WHOIS lookup websites containing organizational domain names, specific employee names (if publicly known or guessed), or internal server naming patterns. Apply correlation analysis between search terms and subsequent connection attempts or other suspicious activities.
